title: WHOLE COMPUTER FREEZING AT LOADING SCREEN IM SO DESPERATE PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
Every time i go into the loading screen, it gets stuck around 60-80% and fully freezes my entire laptop. I've tried reinstalling the client **FOUR **TIMES and the same thing happens again. I even tried repairing the client and it still freezes. I used the hextech repair tool, it shows as everything is fine with the client but still freezes. 
Im still getting stuck on the loading screen, it's been 4 DAYS. **I've tried every possible solution i could. **
**I turned off the Game DVR on xbox on WINDOWS 10 and it STILL doesn't work**.{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}} {{champion:19}}
**CAN YOU PLEASE UPVOTE NO ONE IS REPLYING OR HELPING ME THIS IS GETTING SO GOD DAMN iFRUSTRATING. I NEED A RITO TO HELP FHEABGHVAEHFHJBUHFSFJKSNKFA.**
